detail_desc: Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Metal watch with an adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1.5 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch approx. 3.5 cm.

Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a collar and skirt in lace. Press-studs at the back, and a gathered, elasticated seam at the waist for added width and soft draping.
Knee-length skirt in a jacquard weave with a pattern in shimmering gold-coloured thread. Pleats at the front to create volume and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in a textured weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and decorative sparkly stone buttons down the front. Lined.
Short pencil skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a Henley top and pair of shorts in soft, double-weave organic cotton. Top with a round neck, button placket and short sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular waist, wide waistband with a concealed key pocket, and a zip at the hems.

High-waisted sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide, elasticated panel to hold in and shape the waist and sculpting seams at the back to showcase the body’s physique. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Padded front and back sections, zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and inset side panels in sturdy jersey lined with thermal fleece. Longer and rounded at the back. Partly lined.

Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening at the front and a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with buttons at the top. Long sleeves with a frill trim on the shoulders and elastication with decorative ties at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side and a flounce at the hem. Jersey underskirt.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Legs with creases and contrasting colour side stripes. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Turtleneck body in jersey with a tear-shaped opening at the top, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
